NewsLines.HeadLine: EURO 2012 Schedule Finalized; Poland, Ukraine To Host Games

ContentItem.DataContent: The UEFA Executive Committee approved the EURO 2012 match schedule Monday during a meeting at Minsk, Belarus, with Poland and Ukraine confirmed as hosts of the games slated from June 8- July 1 in 2012.

NewsLines.HeadLine: EURO 2012 Schedule Finalized; Poland, Ukraine To Host Games
Impressive Preseason Earns Rangers Forward Fedotenko One-Year Pact

ContentItem.DataContent: Free agent veteran forward Ruslan Fedotenko, who earned his spot over the past few weeks as a tryout at training camp, was signed to a one-year contract by the New York Rangers. Fedotenko led the Rangers in scoring with seven points in five preseason contests.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Impressive Preseason Earns Rangers Forward Fedotenko One-Year Pact
Big Ben Back: Ban Over For Steelers Quarterback, Roethlisberger Rejoins Team

ContentItem.DataContent: Ben Roethlisberger, who has not suited for the Pittsburgh Steelers since the preseason, is officially back Monday after the Steelers starting quarterback was reinstated by the NFL following a four-game suspension for violating the league's personal conduct policy.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Big Ben Back: Ban Over For Steelers Quarterback, Roethlisberger Rejoins Team
U.S. Wallops France In Straight Sets At Men's Volleyball Worlds

ContentItem.DataContent: Clayton Stanley tallied 14 points, including four blocks and four aces, as the Olympic champion United States clobbered France in straight sets Monday in the third round Pool O of the 2010 FIVB Men's World Championship at PalaLottomatica in Rome, Italy.

NewsLines.HeadLine: U.S. Wallops France In Straight Sets At Men's Volleyball Worlds
Defense, Special Teams Key In Pats' Rout Of Dolphins

ContentItem.DataContent: Patrick Chung blocked two kicks in the second half and returned an interception for a score, while the Patriots' special teams accounted for two scores in New England's 41-14 demolition of the Miami Dolphins Monday night at Sun Life Stadium.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Defense, Special Teams Key In Pats' Rout Of Dolphins
